name: Fancy Roll Ball
description:
Please don't confuse us with other Roll-Ball games because we do have unique designs! 

We are the most brain-burning Roll-Ball game! Come to challenge it!

Free star: 
familiarize the basic game mechanics, move the squares with your fingers, build a path, and move at least one ball to the red target square;

Rotation: 
Feeling nowhere to go? Wait, rotate your block and there may be surprises!

Fork: 
Is one ball already tired? How about two! Use Pick-Block, the two balls will have different forward paths!

Obstacles: 
Combine the path of each ball, so that they have enough attack power to break the obstacles on the road, this is an unprecedented gaming experience!

Pedometer: 
You must reach the end before each ball's steps are reduced to zero and collect all the stars! Believe me, this is not that simple!

Try this game, you will love it!

Notes
. Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)
. You can play offline in anytime.
. Fancy Roll Ball contains the ads like banner, interstitial, and reward video ads.
